column3: I had an appointment in Riviera Village, so went early and had breakfast here. I got the baconator omelet, and it was fantastic!! The potatoes were great too!
Everytime I've visited this restaurant/bar it's been greatFood and alot of fun. After a walk by the ocean is always nice.
Friendly and helpful staff will serve you with delicious food and good beer in this Irish pub. Very near the beach it's great for lunch time or dinner. Well worth a visit
Good food and drinks and good service. Prices fine. Bar menu upstairs and full seafood restaurant down stairs. Got a bit busy one night and a bit loud but still worth going
